2.todos/config/environment
12.5 %

1define("todos/config/environment",
2 ["ember"],
3function (Ember) {
4 var prefix = 'todos';
5/* jshint ignore:start */
6
7try {
8 var metaName = prefix + '/config/environment';
9 var rawConfig = Ember['default'].$('meta[name="' + metaName + '"]').attr('content');
10 var config = JSON.parse(unescape(rawConfig));
11
12 return { 'default': config };
13}
14catch(err) {
15 throw new Error('Could not read config from meta tag with name "' + metaName + '".');
16}
17
18/* jshint ignore:end */
19
20});//# sourceURL=todos/config/environment.js

4.todos/initializers/export-application-global
94.12 %
16/17
1define("todos/initializers/export-application-global",
2 ["exports", "ember", "todos/config/environment"],
3function (exports, Ember, config) {
4
5 'use strict';
6
7 exports.initialize = initialize;
8
9 function initialize() {
10 var application = arguments[1] || arguments[0];
11 if (config['default'].exportApplicationGlobal !== false) {
12 var value = config['default'].exportApplicationGlobal;
13 var globalName;
14
15 if (typeof value === 'string') {
16 globalName = value;
17 } else {
18 globalName = Ember['default'].String.classify(config['default'].modulePrefix);
19 }
20
21 if (!window[globalName]) {
22 window[globalName] = application;
23
24 application.reopen({
25 willDestroy: function willDestroy() {
26 this._super.apply(this, arguments);
27 delete window[globalName];
28 }
29 });
30 }
31 }
32 }
33
34 exports['default'] = {
35 name: 'export-application-global',
36
37 initialize: initialize
38 };
39
40});//# sourceURL=todos/initializers/export-application-global.js

2 ["exports", "ember"],
3function (exports, Ember) {
4
5 'use strict';

7 // routes/todos.js
8 exports['default'] = Ember['default'].Route.extend({
9
10 queryParams: {
11 state: { refreshModel: true }
12 },
13
14 model: function model(params) {
15 return this.store.findAll('todo').then(function (todos) {

17 all: todos,
18 filter: params.state
19 };
20 });

10.todos/components/todos-route/component
69.23 %
18/26
1define("todos/components/todos-route/component",
2 ["exports", "ember"],
3function (exports, Ember) {
4
5 'use strict';
6
7 var Component = Ember['default'].Component;
8 var computed = Ember['default'].computed;
9 var filterBy = Ember['default'].computed.filterBy;
10 var service = Ember['default'].inject.service;
11
12 exports['default'] = Component.extend({
13 store: service(),
14
15 filtered: computed('todos.@each.isCompleted', 'filter', function () {
16 switch (this.get('filter')) {
17 case 'active':
18 return this.get('active');
19 case 'completed':
20 return this.get('completed');
21 default:
22 return this.get('todos');
23 }
24 }),
25
26 completed: filterBy('todos', 'isCompleted', true),
27 active: filterBy('todos', 'isCompleted', false),
28 allAreDone: computed.empty('active'),
29
30 inflection: computed('active.length', function () {
31 var active = this.get('active.length');
32 return active === 1 ? 'item' : 'items';
33 }).readOnly(),
34
35 actions: {
36 createTodo: function createTodo(title) {
37 var store = this.get('store');
38
39 if (title && !title.trim()) {
40 this.set('newTitle', '');
41 return;
42 }
43
44 // Create the new Todo model
45 var todo = store.createRecord('todo', {
46 title: title
47 });
48
49 // Clear the "New Todo" text field
50 this.set('newTitle', '');
51
52 // Save the new model
53 todo.save();
54 },
55
56 completeAll: function completeAll() {
57 var todos = this.get('todos');
58 var allAreDone = this.get('allAreDone');
59
60 todos.setEach('isCompleted', !allAreDone);
61 todos.invoke('save');
62 },
63
64 clearCompleted: function clearCompleted() {
65 var completed = this.get('completed');
66
67 completed.toArray() // clone the array, so it is not bound while we iterate over and delete.
68 .invoke('destroyRecord');
69 }
70 }
71 });
72
73});//# sourceURL=todos/components/todos-route/component.js

12.todos/components/todo-item/component
100 %

1define("todos/components/todo-item/component",
2 ["exports", "ember"],
3function (exports, Ember) {
4
5 'use strict';
6
7 exports['default'] = Ember['default'].Component.extend({
8 tagName: 'li',
9 classNameBindings: ['todo.isCompleted:completed', 'isEditing:editing'],
10
11 init: function init() {
12 this._super.apply(this, arguments);
13 this.set('isEditing', false);
14 },
15
16 actions: {
17 editTodo: function editTodo() {
18 this.set('isEditing', true);
19 },
20
21 save: function save(todo, title) {
22 this.set('isEditing', false);
23
24 todo.set('title', title);
25 todo.save();
26 },
27
28 removeTodo: function removeTodo(todo) {
29 todo.destroyRecord();
30 },
31
32 toggleCompleteTodo: function toggleCompleteTodo(todo) {
33 todo.toggleProperty('isCompleted');
34 todo.save();
35 }
36 }
37 });
38
39});//# sourceURL=todos/components/todo-item/component.js
